Name: Futuclass Chemistry VR
About the game: Futuclass teaches the subjects of Basic Chemistry through gamified experiences in Virtual Reality. Created in co-operation with educational experts, the learning value of each VR lesson has been scientifically proven in both classroom and home setting. Please be aware the VR lessons except Reaction Balancing Demo are not included in the “Futuclass Chemistry VR” game and have to be bought separately as DLC-s.
